abstract: The president of American Airlines is hoping for an eventual merger with British Airways, and expects to see a relaxing of United States foreign ownership rules that will let such a deal happen.
snippet: The president of American Airlines is hoping for an eventual merger with British Airways, and expects to see a relaxing of United States foreign ownership rules that will let such a deal happen.
lead_paragraph: Could another big airline merger take off? The president of American Airlines‘ parent company hopes so.

headline.main: American Airlines Hopes for a B.A. Merger

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
